name: Blood-Shoot
description:
Survive as long as you can against a horde of humans using your own vampiric blood as a weapon!

Conrols:

WASD - walk

LMB - close range melee attack (generates fresh blood)

RMB - shoot vampiric blood at your enemies

Left Shift - suck nearby blood towards yourself

Spacebar - dodge

Enemies:

Grunt - just runs at you

Hunter - spins his whip around in a wide area, but is velnerable after attacking

Mage - stands in place, occasionaly throwing a homing icicle at you

Ninja - a fast, camouflaged grunt

Knight - an absolute unit. He's slow, but if you get hit you probably won't live long enough to regret it
